How to Upload Files # Place PDF or PPTX files in the static/documents/ directory Set the file name appropriately You can download from the links on this page Note: After placing files, please rebuild the Hugo site.
About Security # All files are provided as static files Files are provided as direct download links and can be opened in a browser You can change the file name to restrict access if necessary
